title: BaKaXL启动器错误
author: SXEA
txt_content:

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 降级 forge 或者删除 optfine

replies.author: SXEA
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-10 12:29
降级 forge 或者删除 optfine
怎么降？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
SXEA 发表于 2020-3-10 12:35
怎么降？
那就直接用整合包
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469
